title: John Spaull
text:
John Spaull (born 20 August 1977) is an <a href="Australian%20rules%20footballer">Australian rules footballer</a> who played for <a href="North%20Melbourne%20Football%20Club">North Melbourne</a> in 2000 and 2001.
He was drafted in the <a href="1998%20AFL%20Draft">1999 Pre-season Draft</a> with the 11th selection from the <a href="Mornington%20Peninsula%20Nepean%20Football%20League">Rosebud Football Club</a> in the <a href="Mornington%20Peninsula%20Nepean%20Football%20League">Mornington Peninsula Nepean Football League</a>. He played eight games in two seasons at the Kangaroos before he was delisted at the end of the 2001 season.
